Posts.Content: Hi I am lynette from Zimbabwe I also have BC,mets to my left lung I am on Chemo treatment at the moment I am Taxotere. I was HER2 Neg PR/ER Pos. Heard of Herceptin do you think it will work for me
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer mets to lungs

Posts.Content: Things happened so fast for me in April I discovered lumps in my breast, went for a biopsy and I was told I have breast cancer stage 3. When I went to have a CT scan the cancer hadÂ spread to my left lung.I am currently doing chemo treatment. Just wanted to find out what kind of treatments helped people with this stage of cancer and what natural remendies I can try. It is so scary please help
Posts.Title: Mets to the Lungs
